name: Durendal
skill: Deals 1555/1855 DMG to the row of enemies directly in front. Targets take 24%/28% more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Immune to Poison and deal slightly more DMG.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a holy sword, one of four famed holy relics. Durendal is indestructible, with a beautifully smooth blade that never dulls. Legend has it that the source of the blade's power comes from the protective blessings it received from saints. Long ago, a hero who had fought alongside Durendal, Roland, attempted to destroy the blade. Ever since, the spirit has avoided forming emotional bonds with others. Add to that Durendal's innate shyness, and you get a spirit that seems distant and aloof.

main: "Time to fulfill my duty...? I understand. Leave it to me."
summon: "...Are you to be my new master?"
